title: Ivan Yudin
text:
Ivan Ivanovich Yudin (; born 13 May 1990) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
On 7 June 2019, <a href="Russian%20Football%20Union">Russian Football Union</a> banned him from football activity for three years after he allegedly accepted a bribe for ensuring that his team <a href="FC%20Chernomorets%20Novorossiysk">FC Chernomorets Novorossiysk</a> loses to <a href="FC%20Chayka%20Peschanokopskoye">FC Chayka Peschanokopskoye</a>.
